sentences.chinese: 這些情況預示著要有災禍。

sentences.english: Drooping ears of rice promise another good harvest.
sentences.chinese: 沉甸甸的稻穗預示着又一次豐收。

sentences.english: Must lose one joy, by his life's star foretold.
sentences.chinese: 預示人生命運，必然失歡。

sentences.english: This suggested that potentially they may be an ideal therapeutic agent for the treatment of AIDS.
sentences.chinese: 預示松塔提取物可能成爲艾滋病的理想治療劑。

sentences.english: Dropping ears of rice promise another good harvest .
sentences.chinese: 沉甸甸的稻穗預示着又一次豐收。

sentences.english: The clouds warned that a storm was coming.
sentences.chinese: 烏雲預示着將有暴風雨來臨。

sentences.english: The GLK-Class also heralds further improvements in pedestrian protection.
sentences.chinese: 該glk級，也預示着進一步改善，在行人保護。

sentences.english: The landing on moon heralds a new era of space.
sentences.chinese: 翻譯月球登陸預示着航空史上又一個新時代的到來。

sentences.english: Those black clouds betoken a storm.
sentences.chinese: 那些黑雲預示著暴風雨即將來臨。

sentences.english: In general a dream about a lamb foretells many good things.
sentences.chinese: 在一般的夢想，約羔羊，預示了許多很好的事情。

sentences.english: The drop in retailers indicates they got ahead of themselves. There’s de-risking.
sentences.chinese: 零售業下滑預示了未來，風險很大。

sentences.english: Because of the birthmark, everybody knows exactly how much longer they've got.
sentences.chinese: 因爲有胎記預示，大家都知道他們還剩下多少時間。

sentences.english: This adumbrative also move and dispatch net will urge the construction of news information field energetically.
sentences.chinese: 這也預示着和訊網將大力推動新聞資訊方面的建設。

sentences.english: Finley's relative decrepitude bodes ill for the Spurs.
sentences.chinese: 芬利相對就預示着逐漸衰老的馬刺。

sentences.english: A smooth dress rehearsal augured well for the play.
sentences.chinese: 順利的服裝排練預示着演出成功。

sentences.english: The bright sunshine augurs well for this afternoon's garden dance party.
sentences.chinese: 燦爛的陽光預示着今天下午的露天舞會能順利進行。

definition: to accompany/to follow/to occur together with/concomitant
to undulate/to fluctuate/wave motion/rise and fall
shift in the trend of events/turnaround/plot shift in a book/turn in the conversation
